'''Little Yue's Gift''' is a quest item for the [[World Quest]] "[[A Lone Ship In Guyun]]." [[Little Yue]] makes it for his friend in [[Liyue Harbor]], [[Changchang]], as an apology for being unable to leave the [[Alcor]] to play with her as promised.
